original: nam mkha'i rgyal mtshan yu ba che //
analyzed: nam mkha'i rgyal mtshan yu ba che //
translated: You are the great banner of space,

original: gtong ba'i mtshan khyod phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: gtong ba'i mtshan khyod phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: You are the sign of giving, homage to you!

original: rdo rje bzhad pa bzhad pa che //
analyzed: rdo rje bzhad pa bzhad pa che //
translated: You are the vajra laughter, great laughter,

original: dgyes pa che zhing rab dgyes pa //
analyzed: dgyes pa che zhing rab dgyes pa //
translated: You are the great joy, the supreme joy,

original: dgyes pa'i shugs kyis rol cing dgyes //
analyzed: dgyes pa'i shugs kyis rol cing dgyes //
translated: You are the play of the power of joy, you are the joy,

original: chos dgyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: chos dgyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: You are the joy of Dharma, homage to you!

original: rdo rje chos ni chos che ba //
analyzed: rdo rje chos ni chos che ba //
translated: You are the vajra Dharma, the great Dharma,

original: sems dpa'i chos ni rab sbyor ba //
analyzed: sems dpa'i chos ni rab sbyor ba //
translated: You are the application of the bodhisattva Dharma,

original: sangs rgyas chos te chos rab mchog /
analyzed: sangs rgyas chos te chos rab mchog /
translated: You are the Buddha Dharma, the supreme Dharma,

original: 'dod chos khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'dod chos khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: You are the Dharma of desire, homage to you!

original: rdo rje rnon po ral gri che //
analyzed: rdo rje rnon po ral gri che //
translated: You are the vajra sharpness, the great sword,

original: shes rab ye shes blo gros che //
analyzed: shes rab ye shes blo gros che //
translated: You are the wisdom knowledge, the great intelligence,

original: sdig gcod ral gri chen po ste //
analyzed: sdig gcod ral gri chen po ste //
translated: You are the great sword that cuts through evil,

original: sangs rgyas mtshon khyod phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mtshon khyod phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: You are the weapon of the Buddha, homage to you!🔽You are the vajra cause, the great wheel,

original: rdo rje rgyu ste 'khor lo che; ;sangs rgyas 'khor lo gter chen po //
analyzed: rdo rje rgyu ste 'khor lo che; ;sangs rgyas 'khor lo gter chen po //
translated: You are the wheel of the Buddha, the great treasure,

original: dkyil 'khor kun te chos kyi mchog /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor kun te chos kyi mchog /
translated: You are the totality of mandalas, the supreme Dharma,

original: chos kyi dkyil 'khor khyod phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: chos kyi dkyil 'khor khyod phyag 'tshal //
translated: You are the mandala of Dharma, homage to you!

original: rdo rje gsung ba gsung ba che //
analyzed: rdo rje gsung ba gsung ba che //
translated: You are the vajra speech, the great speech,

original: spros med yi @319a *//
analyzed: spros med yi @319a *//
translated: You are the unelaborate speech,

original: ge chen po ste //
analyzed: ge chen po ste //
translated: You are the great syllable.

original: yi ge med pa bzlas pa che //
analyzed: yi ge med pa bzlas pa che //
translated: You are the recitation without syllables.

original: sangs rgyas gsung khyod phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas gsung khyod phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to you, Buddha-speech!

original: rdo rje las te las rab mchog /
analyzed: rdo rje las te las rab mchog /
translated: You are the vajra action, the best of actions,

original: las chen las rab byed pa ste gsang ba'i mchod pa mchod pa che //
analyzed: las chen las rab byed pa ste gsang ba'i mchod pa mchod pa che //
translated: The great action, the one who performs great actions, the secret offering, the great offering.

original: sangs rgyas mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to you, supreme Buddha!

original: rdo rje srung ba go cha che //🔽go cha'i mchog ste brtan pa che //
analyzed: rdo rje srung ba go cha che // go cha'i mchog ste brtan pa che //
translated: You are the vajra armor, the great armor,🔽The supreme armor, the great firmness,

original: srung ba che zhing snying po che //
analyzed: srung ba che zhing snying po che //
translated: The great protection, the great essence.

original: sangs rgyas brtson 'grus phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas brtson 'grus phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to you, Buddha-energy!

original: rdo rje gnod sbyin khro bo che //
analyzed: rdo rje gnod sbyin khro bo che //
translated: You are the vajra yakṣa, the great wrathful one,

original: ma rungs thams cad skrag byed pa //
analyzed: ma rungs thams cad skrag byed pa //
translated: The one who terrifies all evildoers.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen te //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen te //
translated: You are the great means of all the buddhas.

original: bsrung ba mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bsrung ba mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to you, supreme protector!

original: rdo rje bsdams pa phyag 'tshal lo //🔽dam tshig chen po bcing ba che //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa phyag 'tshal lo // dam tshig chen po bcing ba che //
translated: Homage to you, vajra-bound one!🔽You are the great pledge, the great binding,

original: khu tshur chen po phyag rgya che //
analyzed: khu tshur chen po phyag rgya che //
translated: The great fist, the great seal.

original: rdo rje khu tshur khyod phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur khyod phyag 'tshal //
translated: Homage to you, vajra fist!

original: de bzhin gshegs pa phyag bya zhing; ;brjod de mchod de bsti stang bya //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa phyag bya zhing; ;brjod de mchod de bsti stang bya //
translated: And praise, worship, and revere him,

original: gang phyir thog ma tha ma med //
analyzed: gang phyir thog ma tha ma med //
translated: Because he is without beginning or end.

original: byang chub sems ni khyod yin te //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni khyod yin te //
translated: You are the thought of enlightenment,🔽And because of you, the Victorious Ones,🔽And all the heroic Bodhisattvas,

original: khyod la brten na rgyal ba dang // dpa' bo byang chub sems dpa' kun; ;byung zhing yang dag 'byung 'gyur bas //
analyzed: khyod la brten na rgyal ba dang // dpa' bo byang chub sems dpa' kun; ;byung zhing yang dag 'byung 'gyur bas //
translated: Have appeared and will continue to appear.

original: sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi rgyu //🔽rdo rje sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi rgyu // rdo rje sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal //
translated: You are the cause of the supreme enlightenment of the Buddhas.🔽Homage to you, Vajrasattva!

original: rdo rje rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal //🔽rdo rje chos khyod phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal // rdo rje chos khyod phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to you, Vajraratna!🔽Homage to you, Vajradharma!

original: rdo rje las ni khyod phyag 'tshal //🔽yang dag par ni phyag 'tshal zhing //
analyzed: rdo rje las ni khyod phyag 'tshal // yang dag par ni phyag 'tshal zhing //
translated: Homage to you, Vajrakarma!🔽All the merit that I have gained

original: mtshan mchog gis ni khyod bstod pa'i //
analyzed: mtshan mchog gis ni khyod bstod pa'i //
translated: By praising you with these supreme names,🔽I dedicate to the attainment of the enlightenment of the Buddhas.

original: bsod nams gang yin de kun @319b kyang; ;sangs rgyas byang chub thob par shog /🔽mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni //
analyzed: bsod nams gang yin de kun @319b kyang; ;sangs rgyas byang chub thob par shog / mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni //
translated: Whoever, with complete faith,🔽Recites just once

original: rab dad pas ni lan gcig tsam //🔽gang gis legs par brjod pa ni //
analyzed: rab dad pas ni lan gcig tsam //🔽gang gis legs par brjod pa ni //
translated: This praise of the one hundred and eight names,

original: kun kyang sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: kun kyang sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur //
translated: All of them will become Buddhas.

original: zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
translated: Thus has spoken the Buddha, the Blessed One.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te /
translated: Then the Bodhisattva Mahasattva Vajrapani, all the Tathagatas gathered together as one,

original: gsung gcig tu legs so zhes bya ba de byin no //
analyzed: gsung gcig tu legs so zhes bya ba de byin no //
translated: gave the approval with the words Excellent!

original: rdo rje theg pa bla na med //
analyzed: rdo rje theg pa bla na med //
translated: The unsurpassed Vajrayana,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang //
translated: the secret of all Tathagatas,

original: theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i //
analyzed: theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i //
translated: the essence of the Mahayana,

original: mdo 'di legs par bshad pas na //🔽rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so //
analyzed: mdo 'di legs par bshad pas na // rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so //
translated: by explaining this sutra well,🔽Vajrasattva, you are excellent!

original: rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so //🔽rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so // rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so //
translated: Vajraratna, you are excellent!🔽Vajradharma, you are excellent!

original: rdo rje las ni khyod kyang legs //
analyzed: rdo rje las ni khyod kyang legs //
translated: Vajrakarma, you are also excellent!

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpar dam bcas pa rang gi thugs la zhugs pa thams cad dgyes shing mnyes nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa la mngon par dgyes par gyur to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpar dam bcas pa rang gi thugs la zhugs pa thams cad dgyes shing mnyes nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa la mngon par dgyes par gyur to //
translated: The Blessed One having spoken thus, all the Tathagatas and the noble Bodhisattvas who had taken the vow rejoiced in their hearts, and were delighted by the words of the Blessed Vajrasattva.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa zhes  phya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rgyud nye bar bsdus pa dang bcas pa rdzogs so ////
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa zhes  phya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rgyud nye bar bsdus pa dang bcas pa rdzogs so ////
translated: The Tantra of the Great Vehicle, called the Compendium of the Principles of All Tathāgatas, together with its summary, is complete.

original: rgyud 'di la 'gyur byang mi snang na'ang /🔽pandi ta shraddh'a ka ra warmma dang / bod kyi @320a *//
analyzed: rgyud 'di la 'gyur byang mi snang na'ang / pandi ta shraddh'a ka ra warmma dang / bod kyi @320a *//
translated: Although there is no colophon in this tantra,🔽it is known to have been translated by the paṇḍita Śraddhākaravarma and

original: lo tstsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur bar grags so //
analyzed: lo tstsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur bar grags so //
translated: the Tibetan translator-monk Rinchen Zangpo.
